title: Failed to start beacon node
body:
## Description

I'm tried to launch lighthouse from scratch and got error. Full log:
```
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:20.860 INFO Logging to file                         path: "/root/.lighthouse/beacon/logs/beacon.log"
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:20.868 INFO Lighthouse started                      version: Lighthouse/v3.4.0-38514c0
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:20.869 INFO Configured for network                  name: prater
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:20.869 INFO Data directory initialised              datadir: /root/.lighthouse
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:20.869 INFO Deposit contract                        address: 0xff50ed3d0ec03ac01d4c79aad74928bff48a7b2b, deploy_block: 4367322
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:21.008 INFO Starting checkpoint sync                remote_url: https://goerli.checkpoint-sync.ethdevops.io/, service: beacon
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:21.363 WARN Remote BN does not support EIP-4881 fast deposit sync, error: Error fetching deposit snapshot from remote: StatusCode(403), service: beacon
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:21.515 CRIT Failed to start beacon node             reason: Error fetching finalized block from remote: StatusCode(403)
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:21.515 INFO Internal shutdown received              reason: Failed to start beacon node
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:21.515 INFO Shutting down..                         reason: Failure("Failed to start beacon node")
ethereum_1  | Failed to start beacon node
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:22.321 INFO Logging to file                         path: "/root/.lighthouse/beacon/logs/beacon.log"
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:22.324 INFO Lighthouse started                      version: Lighthouse/v3.4.0-38514c0
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:22.325 INFO Configured for network                  name: prater
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:22.325 INFO Data directory initialised              datadir: /root/.lighthouse
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:22.325 INFO Deposit contract                        address: 0xff50ed3d0ec03ac01d4c79aad74928bff48a7b2b, deploy_block: 4367322
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:22.511 INFO Starting checkpoint sync                remote_url: https://goerli.checkpoint-sync.ethdevops.io/, service: beacon
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:22.828 WARN Remote BN does not support EIP-4881 fast deposit sync, error: Error fetching deposit snapshot from remote: StatusCode(403), service: beacon
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:22.984 CRIT Failed to start beacon node             reason: Error fetching finalized block from remote: StatusCode(403)
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:22.986 INFO Internal shutdown received              reason: Failed to start beacon node
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:22.986 INFO Shutting down..                         reason: Failure("Failed to start beacon node")
ethereum_1  | Failed to start beacon node
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:24.227 INFO Logging to file                         path: "/root/.lighthouse/beacon/logs/beacon.log"
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:24.227 INFO Lighthouse started                      version: Lighthouse/v3.4.0-38514c0
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:24.227 INFO Configured for network                  name: prater
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:24.227 INFO Data directory initialised              datadir: /root/.lighthouse
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:24.227 INFO Deposit contract                        address: 0xff50ed3d0ec03ac01d4c79aad74928bff48a7b2b, deploy_block: 4367322
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:24.438 INFO Starting checkpoint sync                remote_url: https://goerli.checkpoint-sync.ethdevops.io/, service: beacon
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:24.768 WARN Remote BN does not support EIP-4881 fast deposit sync, error: Error fetching deposit snapshot from remote: StatusCode(403), service: beacon
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:24.908 CRIT Failed to start beacon node             reason: Error fetching finalized block from remote: StatusCode(403)
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:24.908 INFO Internal shutdown received              reason: Failed to start beacon node
ethereum_1  | Feb 13 09:27:24.908 INFO Shutting down..                         reason: Failure("Failed to start beacon node")
ethereum_1  | Failed to start beacon node
```


Version is 3.4.0
docker-compose.yaml:
```
version: "3.5"
services:
  ethereum:
    image: sigp/lighthouse:v3.4.0
    restart: always
    network_mode: host
    volumes:
     - ./data:/root/.lighthouse
     - ./jwtsecret:/tmp/jwtsecret
    command:
      lighthouse
      --network prater beacon_node
      --debug-level info
      --eth1
      --http
      --datadir /root/.lighthouse
      --execution-endpoints http://erigon_ethereum_goerli:8551
      --enr-udp-port=9000
      --enr-tcp-port=9000
      --discovery-port=9000
      --checkpoint-sync-url=https://goerli.checkpoint-sync.ethdevops.io
      --purge-db
      --jwt-secrets="/tmp/jwtsecret"
```
before it works fine
I've changed the checkpoint-sync-url to a different one and it seems to be working
